tooltip.legendofthecurse.ringofthecurse_: The Curses will be sent on you:
1. Once on fire you will never go out
2. Neutral mobs are always agressive to you
4. You are less stable to injuries
5. You feel bad every time you try to sleep
6. You are weak after every your attack
7. Every death will tear your soul apart
1. You are lucky every time you mine or kill a mob
2. You get more xp after killing a mob
6. You can get unique drop from mobs
7. You can open ender chest anywhere you want
Once wear it is bind to you
Press shift to reveal curses and Blessings
